nodes.text: A forger was an individual who profited by forging and selling fake documents or credits. Gwellis Bagnoro was a male Onodone who specialized in forging transit documents.

Before joining the Naboo Royal Handmaidens, Rabene Tonsort had run a forgery ring at her school that created and sold forged artwork to unwary offworlders, a fact that Captain Quarsh Panaka attempted to hold over her head as a threat when he recruited her.
